channel.title: Shop help plz
channel.description: my shops only have 3 options; value, buy, and examine. when you click buy, it only buys 1 which can be very inconvient. how do i add buy 1, 5, 10, x? also, how do i add "sell 1, 5, 10, x? when i right click the item in my inventory, it says drop, equip, examine, etc, as if i was not in the shop or something. anyone have tuts or codes or something? (508 server) thanks! :D

item.title: Shop help plz
item.dc:creator: @ILOVEJAVA ILOVEJAVA
item.description:
@ILOVEJAVA wrote:

my shops only have 3 options; value, buy, and examine. when you click buy, it only buys 1 which can be very inconvient. how do i add buy 1, 5, 10, x? also, how do i add "sell 1, 5, 10, x? when i right click the item in my inventory, it says drop, equip, examine, etc, as if i was not in the shop or something. anyone have tuts or codes or something? (508 server)
thanks!
